record.title: MEASURES READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2615, S. 2616, and S. 2619
record.narrative:
MEASURES READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2615, S. 2616, and S. 2619 -- (Senate - February 08, 2008)

[Page: S821]

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, it is my understanding that there are three bills at the desk. I ask for their first reading en bloc.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bills by title.
The bill clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 2615) to extend the Protect America Act of 2007 for 15 days.
A bill (S. 2616) to authorize certain programs and activities in the Forest Service, the Department of the Interior, and the Department of Energy, and for other purposes.
A bill (S. 2619) to protect innocent Americans from violent crime in national parks.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I now ask for a second reading, en bloc, but object to my own request.
